title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 24 June 2013 - XWiki
content:

09:15 <vmassol> has quit  
10:56 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:56 <vmassol> good morning gys, I'm sorry I had some unplanned meeting and I forgot to tell you this morning  
10:57 <sdumitriu> has quit  
10:59 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
11:03 <vmassol> yeah :)  
12:19 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:46 <evalica> has quit  
13:36 <npm> has quit  
13:36 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
14:29 <vmassol> is marius on holidays today?  
14:30 <vmassol> tmortagne: I guess you're still busy for RC1? Any idea when we can start the release?  
14:30 <vmassol> anything else blocking?  
14:30 <vmassol> (a few CI tests are failing I think)  
14:31 <tmortagne> vmassol: yes marius is in holidays and I doubt we can release today  
14:31 <vmassol> ah yes it's bank holiday in Romania today I remember now :)  
14:32 <vmassol> funny he didn't mention it on the list as he's the RM ;)  
14:32 <vmassol> tmortagne: will you be ready tomorrow on your side?  
14:34 <tmortagne> vmassol: depends what ready means, all I can say is that the Solr bugs I'm working on should be fixed tomorrow  
14:34 <vmassol> ok, are there any open issues on solr that you know about at this stage?  
14:35 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=project%20%3D%20XWIKI%20AND%20component%20%3D%20%22Search%20-%20Solr%22%20AND%20status%20%3D%20Open%20ORDER%20BY%20priority%20DESC  
14:35 <tmortagne> vmassol: I just said I was working on Solr bug so yes there is Solr open issues...  
14:35 <vmassol> no bugs there  
14:35 <vmassol> well some issues are minor and that's ok for 5.1 final  
14:35 <vmassol> others may be important  
14:36 <tmortagne> Fix Version has not been set on the issues I see  
14:36 <vmassol> so right now since there are no open bugs, I assume you don't know any exisitng issue on the quality of solr results, right?  
14:37 <vmassol> I'll do some testing in 1 hour or so  
14:37 <tmortagne> I don't understand your question  
14:37 <vmassol> you might know some existing issue but without having created a jira issue  
14:38 <tmortagne> I keep telling you that I'm working on Solr bugs that are on jira  
14:38 <vmassol> I don't see any bugs in jira  
14:38 <vmassol> again: http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=project%20%3D%20XWIKI%20AND%20component%20%3D%20%22Search%20-%20Solr%22%20AND%20status%20%3D%20Open%20ORDER%20BY%20priority%20DESC  
14:38 <tmortagne> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9256 created by you  
14:38 <vmassol> so where are they?  
14:39 <vmassol> hmm I wodner why it doesn't show in my request  
14:39 <tmortagne> probably because you search do open and not in progress  
14:39 <vmassol> ah open  
14:40 <vmassol> ok better query:  
14:40 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=project%20%3D%20XWIKI%20AND%20component%20%3D%20%22Search%20-%20Solr%22%20AND%20resolution%20in%20(Unresolved)%20ORDER%20BY%20priority%20DESC  
14:41 <vmassol> tmortagne: what about XWIKI-9174, is that something you'll do before 5.1 final too?  
14:42 <tmortagne> I won't have time but it's not a big deal anymore since the actual indexing is done on Java already, what is left is the listing of things to index on velocity side  
14:43 <vmassol> ok, yes indeed it's important to be able to display the indexing status so that users know why they don't get results they expect for example (if an indexing is in progress and their doc is not indexed yet)  
14:45 <tmortagne> that part is mostly a UI thing now, the script service expose the size of the queue now  
14:45 <vmassol> ok cool, we'll need to talk to Marius about this then  
14:45 <tmortagne> I doubt he will have time to work on that before 5.1RC1  
14:46 <vmassol> hmm I remember he wanted to commit the horizontal menu too for RC1
